anti_patterns.rule: CHECKBOX items do not use hints.
CHECKBOX items do not use validators.

validators_common: Mandatory (required for 43/44 checkbox items the exception is a conditional/optional item).
hints_common: Tooltip used for some checkbox items to provide additional context.
choice_authoring: Each checkbox is a single option (not a group).
Points are used for scoring (2.0 for symptoms 0.0 for 'none of the above').
